name: iOS Development Best Practices
body:
# UI  
## Views  
### UIButton  
* Positions of title and image  
  Edge insets is the official answer. But it will be troublesome if you have to deal with a lot of buttons with a specific pattern. A better solution is to subclass UIButton and override the ``layoutSubviews`` method. [[ref](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2515998/iphone-uibutton-image-position)]
